title: Mouse Cookies: 10 Easy-To-Make Cookie Recipes with a Story in Pictures
description: Ten easy-to-make recipes simple enough for the youngest baker, including peanut butter munches, old-fashioned oatmeal cookies, and jumbo chocolate chip cookies. While you're waiting for your cookies to come out of the oven, enjoy the brand-new story in picturesâ€”this time the boy from If You Give a Mouse a Cookie visits the mouse's house!
author: Laura Joffe Numeroff
